DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess biological activity ZD6126 subject newly diagnose metastatic renal cell carcinoma ( stage IV ) .
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Study Assess Biological Activity ZD6126 Subjects With Newly Diagnosed Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma ( Stage IV )
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnose metastatic renal cell carcinoma Suitable nephrectomy Prior chemotherapy , biological therapy radiation therapy renal cell carcinoma within last 3 year cancer Significant cardiac event within 3 month entry Any history coronary angioplasty history myocardial infarction
